The call to prayer of {{prayer}} is in: The call to prayer of {{prayer}} is in
Now is the time for {{prayer}} prayer: Now is the time for {{prayer}} prayer
The prophet PBUH said: The prophet Peace Be Upon Him said
DUAA_DURING_ADHAN: Whenever you hear the Adhan, say what the Muâ€™adh-dhin (caller) is saying
DUAA_AFTER_ADHAN_1: O Allah! Lord of this perfect call (perfect by not ascribing partners to You) and of the regular prayer which is going to be established, give Muhammad the right of intercession and illustriousness, and resurrect him to the best and the highest place in Paradise that You promised him (of)], then my intercession for him will be allowed on the Day of Resurrection
DUAA_AFTER_ADHAN_2: Whoever says: I am content with God as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad as a messenger, Paradise is obligatory for him.
DUAA_AFTER_ADHAN_3: If you hear the muezzin, say what he says, then pray for me; Whoever sends a prayer upon me, may God bless him ten times, then ask God for the means for me; It is a status in Paradise that is not appropriate for anyone but one of the servants of God, and I hope that I am him. Whoever asks for the means for me, intercession is permissible for him
DUAA_AFTER_ADHAN_4: Whoever says when he hears the muezzin: I bear witness that there is no god but God, alone and without partner, and that Muhammad is His servant and Messenger, I am satisfied with God as my Lord, and with Muhammad as my Messenger, and with Islam as my religion; His guilt was forgiven
DUAA_AFTER_ADHAN_5: The supplication is not rejected between the call to prayer and the iqaamah. call me
DUAA_AFTER_ADHAN_6: Two things that are not rejected, or they are rarely rejected: supplication at the time of the call, and in the case of strength when one another is welded.
